derivation: a primitive root; also denominative from H5275 (נַעַל)
outline:
1. to bar, lock, bolt
    1. (Qal) to bar, lock, bolt
  2. to furnish with sandals, shoe
    1. (Qal) to shoe
    2. (Hiphil) to give sandals
kjv_def: bolt, inclose, lock, shoe, shut up.
strongs_def: properly, to fasten up, i.e. with abar or cord; hence, to sandal, i.e. furnish with slippers
